text: Anri Mikhail-ipa Jergenia (; 8 August 1941 – 5 January 2020) was an Abkhazian politician. From June 2001 to November 2002 he was the Prime Minister. He was a presidential candidate for the 2004 election. He was born in Leningrad, Russian SFSR. He was a member of the Amtsakhara. Jergenia died in Moscow on 5 January 2020 at the age of 78.Ушел из жизни абхазский политический деятель Анри Джергения ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Saint Petersburg Category:Prime ministers of Abkhazia
title: Anri Jergenia
